title.narrative: Smallholder Commercialization and Agribusiness Development Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to promote smallholder commercialization by fostering productive business linkages between s mallholder farmers and selected agribusiness firms and other commodity off-takers in Sierra Leone. The Project has four components: (1) Support to agribusiness-farmer linkages and SMEs along selected agricultural value chains (US$ 19 million);  (2) Market Acc ess Improvement (US$26 million); (3) Capacity Building for Government and Other Institutions relevant for agribusiness development ( US$ 6 million); and (4) Project Coordination, Monitoring and Evaluation (US$ 4 million).

participating-org.narrative: Sierra Leone Smallholder Commercialization and Agribusiness Development Project Single-Donor Trust Fund
